name: SnowyiHome
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With a simple voice command, skill can turn on/off your lights, adjust the brightness and color temperature of your lights, turn on/off your air conditioning unit, set the mode, adjust the temperature, and even open/close your curtains. She's always ready to make your life more convenient and comfortable.

Light
"...,turn on living room light"
"...,turn off living room light"
"...,set the Kitchen Light to eighty percent."
"...,brighten the bathroom light to seventy five percent."

Blind
"...,open the living room blind"
"...,close the living room blind"

Temperature
"...,turn on bedroom temperature"
"...,turn off bedroom temperature"
"...,set bedroom temperature to thrty"
"...,set bedroom temperature to Cool"
"...,set bedroom temperatur to Heat"
